title: Gautam Adani draws total remuneration of ₹10.41 cr pay in FY25, lags behind peers
description: Gautam Adani, 62, drew salaries from two out of the nine listed companies in his ports-to-energy conglomerate, the latest annual reports of the listed entities of the group showed.

title: Defence, realty among 8 sectors that led Indian market gains in May
description: The Nifty Microcap 250 surged 12.10%, the Smallcap 250 climbed 9.59%, and the Nifty Midcap 150 rose 6.30%.

title: TReDS platform M1xchage plans IPO in 3-5 years
description: M1xchage, a leading RBI-licensed Trade Receivables Discounting System (TReDS) platform, which is witnessing an 80-90 per cent annual growth in business, is planning to go public in the next 3-5 years.

title: Promoter family to offload 2.9% stake in Suzlon Energy via block deal: Report
description: Suzlon Energy’s promoters, the Tanti Family and Trust, are set to sell 20 crore shares via a Rs 1,295 crore block deal at a 2.9% discount. The deal includes a 180-day lock-in period and is seen as a strategic move to manage debt. Market experts view the transaction as a sign of sustained investor interest in India’s renewable energy sector.

title: Fund Manager Talk | Markets may move in 5% range till festive season: Trideep Bhattacharya
description: Indian equities are expected to consolidate in a narrow range over the next few months as corporate earnings remain the missing link, says Trideep Bhattacharya of Edelweiss MF. While macro headwinds have eased and policy momentum has improved, meaningful earnings revival is seen only in H2FY26. Consumption, financials, and defence are key sectors to watch, with selective midcap exposure advised.

title: US markets, FII action among 7 factors that can steer D-Street this week
description: Nifty formed a bullish engulfing pattern, signaling strength as it eyes a breakout above 25,100. RBI’s surprise rate cut lifted equities and the rupee, while FIIs turned net sellers for June. Key corporate actions, SME IPOs, and crude oil trends will guide market sentiment this week. Tata and Adani Group stocks are in focus for dividend-related movements.

title: Corporate Actions This Week — Asian Paints, Trent, ACC, Ambuja Cements; Track Record Dates
description: These stocks will trade ex-dividend this week — check ex-dates here.

title: India, US CPI; Trade Data From Europe, Japan; Three SME IPOs — The Week Ahead
description: The spotlight will be on India's CPI data that is expected later on during the week. Apart from this, key trade and industrial data is expected from the US, Japan and Europe.

title: HDFC Bank 'Strongly' Denies Allegations Against Its MD And CEO, Calls It 'Malicious'
description: HDFC Bank will pursue legal remedies and options to defend its MD & CEO’s reputation, it said in a statement.

title: What is India’s latest approach to localising EV manufacturing?
description: At the centre of the Scheme to Promote Manufacturing of Electric Passenger Cars in India is the provision to reduce customs duty on the import of ready-to-ship completely assembled electric four-wheelers to 15%

title: Infosys gets huge relief on GST as DGGI closes ₹32,400-crore pre-show cause notice
description: The GST demand, in fact, exceeds Infosys’s annual profits — Infosys’s net profit for full FY25 stood at ₹26,713 crore — and its closure now is bound to come as a significant relief for the tech major

title: HDFC Bank denies allegations against MD & CEO Jagdishan, says recalcitrant defaulters at work to thwart recovery
description: The Lilavati Hospital Trust has demanded suspension of Mr Jagdishan for his alleged “direct involvement in serious of financial fraud, criminal conspiracy, abuse of fiduciary position, evidence tampering, and obstruction of justice”

title: RBI Rate Cut Impact: BoB, UCO Bank, PNB And BoI Lower Lending Rates
description: A number of banks have lowered their lending rates following the RBI's repo rate cut on Friday.

title: German packaging ink major Siegwerk plans to double capacity in India as economy grows
Will India’s anti-drone tech fly on the global stage?
description: A story that talks about India's evolving counter-drone systems and what it means for the defence industry.

title: ????A slightly different Sunny Side Up edition
description: A Sunny Side Up edition where we talk about the hidden costs and unexpected expenses Indian students face when they move abroad.

title: RBI’s gold loan direction brings clarity, standardisation, greater consumer protection, says Manappuram Finance MD
Charting The Global Economy: ECB Nearing End Of Rate-Cut Cycle
description: In the US, the closely watched jobs report showed payrolls growth is moderating, rather than abruptly weakening.

title: Vietnamese automaker VinFast bets big on India’s fledgling EV market
description: ‘We don’t want to just sell cars; we want to bring in the whole EV ecosystem,’ says VinFast Asia CEO ahead of product launch

title: Vijay Mallya Says Willing To Return To India 'If I Get Assurance Of...'
description: Talking about his business, media "misunderstanding", potential of coming back to India and more, Mallya breaks down his journey and what lies ahead.

title: Extreme poverty in India down to 5.3% in 2022-23: World Bank
description: World Bank reports India’s poverty reduction success, lifting 171 million from extreme poverty, with a 5.3% rate in 2022-23

title: GST Breather For Infosys: DGGI Closes Rs 32,400 Crore Pre-Show Cause Notice
description: With the receipt of the communication from DGGI, 'this matter stands closed', India's second-largest IT company Infosys said.

title: China Leaders Take Reins At TikTok Shop In US As Sales Miss Goal
description: TikTok Shop initially set a goal to increase its US e-commerce business tenfold last year to $17.5 billion in transaction volume

title: Trump’s China Gambit Belies Rocky Road Ahead On Tariff Deals
description: Trump’s aides insisted Friday that the president was moving on and focused on his economic agenda.

title: Real estate stocks deliver rocket returns this week as BSE Realty eclipses sectoral peers with 10% rally
description: The real estate sector has emerged as a powerhouse, with the BSE Realty index recording substantial weekly gains. This momentum can be traced back to the Reserve Bank of India's repo rate cut, which has sparked renewed interest in property investments. Leading the charge is Sobha, whose stock has taken off, joined by gains in Financial Services and Metal sectors.

title: Nibe Ties Up With Defence Ministry To Manufacture Modular Bridging Systems
description: The modular bridging systems will consist of various lengths from 14 metres to 46 metres.

title: Lilavati Trust Calls For Suspension And Prosecution Of HDFC Bank CEO
description: HDFC Bank, in its reply, "strongly denied" the allegation, calling it "baseless and malicious".

title: Government appoints RBI Deputy Governor T. Rabi Sankar as 16th Finance Commission member
description: The government constituted the 16th Finance Commission, chaired by Niti Aayog V-C Arvind Panagariya on December 31, 2023, who will submit its report to the President by October 31, 2025

title: Suzlon Promoters Reportedly Eye Rs 1,300 Crore Fundraise Through Block Deals
description: As of March 2025, promoters of the company hold a 13.25% stake in the wind turbine manufacturer.

title: Indian markets advance in May, powered by 22% defence rally and microcap strength
description: Indian equities surged in May 2025, led by a 22% rise in defence stocks and a 12.1% gain in microcaps. Broader markets outperformed large caps as risk-on sentiment returned. An unexpected RBI rate cut in June further boosted optimism.

title: Dalal Street Week Ahead: Nifty near breakout as resistance seen at 25,100; PSU banks, energy lead sectoral momentum
description: The Nifty showed signs of upward movement after a two-week consolidation, closing with a weekly gain of 1.02%. It faces resistance at 25,100-25,150, and a breakout is needed for a sustained uptrend. PSU Banks are expected to outperform, while IT shows bottoming-out signs. A cautiously positive approach is advised, focusing on profit protection and strong technical setups.

title: F&O Talk | June series shows positive bias for Nifty, Bank Nifty over 18-year trend: Sudeep Shah
description: Markets ended the week nearly 1% higher despite global headwinds, driven by the RBI's surprise 50 bps rate cut and a strong breakout in Bank Nifty. Nifty neared 25,000 amid positive momentum and falling volatility.

title: RBI surprise to boost earnings, support India’s market outperformance: Mayuresh Joshi
description: The market reacted positively to the rate cut. Reserve Bank of India changed policy stance to neutral. This move ensures financial system transmission. Corporate earnings may grow 12.5% to 14.5%. Input cost inflation is expected to go lower. Tax cuts will increase discretionary spending. Rural consumption may strongly comeback. Banks and NBFCs will benefit.

title: Gold selloff on jobs euphoria is misguided? Peter Schiff says rebound coming
description: A sharp selloff in gold and a surge in equities following the May U.S. jobs report is a knee-jerk reaction that overlooks deeper economic vulnerabilities, says economist Peter Schiff. Calling the market response “misguided,” Schiff argues that gold’s rebound is likely as headline optimism fades and investors refocus on underlying labour market fragility and long-term inflation risks.

title: Government urged to address structural issues faced by the textile and apparel sector
description: The exports should grow at 17% CAGR to achieve the target of $ 100 billion by 2030.

title: Mind Over Money: Emotional Intelligence is the new leadership edge — and women are already there
description: Women leaders are more open, intentional, and proactive about mental fitness than men, say experts. Their emphasis on self-reflection and emotional well-being influences their leadership approach, while men adopt structured strategies with performance-focused goals.

title: Speed of doing business for ease of doing business: Streamlining India’s corporate restructuring
description: Corporate restructuring in India is still hampered by NCLT delays, despite reforms aimed at simplifying the process. With over 15,000 cases pending and no statutory deadlines for merger approvals, even uncontroversial schemes face long waits. A dedicated Corporate Restructuring Authority under the MCA could streamline processes and ease India’s regulatory burden, unlocking faster deal execution and greater investor confidence.

title: IndiGrid To Acquire Transmission, Solar Assets For Rs 2,100 Crore
description: Subject to regulatory and contractual approvals, IndiGrid will acquire 100% shareholding and management control of both assets.

title: Gemini confidentially files for US IPO as crypto markets heat up
description: Gemini, run by the Winklevoss twins, has confidentially filed for a US IPO. This move comes as crypto firms see renewed market strength. Circle's recent successful debut has encouraged others. Experts say crypto firms should seize this opportunity. The IPO surge signals growing confidence in the crypto industry. This could bring more transparency and capital to the market.

title: Netflix Ties Up With Ekta Kapoor's Balaji Telefilms To Make Fresh Projects
description: Balaji and Netflix have previously have previosly produced several titles like Kathal, Pagglait, Jaane Jaan and Dolly Kitty Aur Woh Chamakte Sitare.

title: Corporate action: 10 stocks from Tata, Adani Groups to trade ex-dividend next week. Check details
description: In the upcoming week, 10 key stocks from Tata and Adani Groups will trade ex-dividend, offering investors dividend payouts. Tata’s Nelco, Tata Investment Corporation, Tata Elxsi, Tata Chemicals, and Trent join Adani’s ACC, Adani Enterprises, Adani Ports & SEZ, Ambuja Cements, and Adani Total Gas on the list.

title: Bajaj Finance fixes June 16 as record date for 1:2 stock split, 4:1 bonus equity share
description: Bajaj Finance has fixed June 16, 2025, as the record date for its 1:2 stock split and 4:1 bonus equity share issue. This comes after a strong Q4 performance, with 19% YoY profit growth, 26% AUM rise, and RBI’s surprise rate cut boosting sentiment.

title: GST returns to become time-barred from July tax period
description: Thus, GST outward supply returns, besides returns related to payment of the liability, annual returns and tax collected at source will become time-barred.

title: Cochin Shipyard, Astrazeneca among top 10 small-cap gainers this week, rallying up to 28%
description: Sensex and Nifty posted weekly gains after two weeks of decline, led by a 50 bps rate cut by RBI. Small-cap stocks surged, with top performers like Quick Heal, Bharat Wire Ropes, and Cochin Shipyard rising 18–28%.

title: Midcaps, smallcaps may rally another 3–4% amid strong buying interest: Rajesh Palviya
description: Rajesh Palviya sees continued momentum in midcap and smallcap stocks, citing chart breakouts and strong investor interest, with potential for a further 3–4% rally ahead.

title: Concurrent Gainers: These 6 stocks gain for 5 days in a row
NVIDIA To Build India's First AI University In Andhra Pradesh, Announces CM Chandrababu Naidu
description: In addition, 500 AI startups from Andhra Pradesh will gain access to NVIDIA's Inception Program, which provides global exposure and key resources.

title: Lalithaa Jewellery Mart Files IPO Papers For Rs 1,700 Crore Offer
description: Lalithaa Jewellery Mart proposes to utilise the proceeds from the fresh issue of shares to set up 12 new stores in India.

title: Dixon Technologies, LIC Housing Finance among 10 mid-cap stocks analysts expect to gain up to 40%
description: Brokerages remain bullish on mid-cap stocks like Dixon Technologies, Crompton Greaves, and Aurobindo Pharma. Analyst ratings suggest up to 40% upside based on Trendlyne data covering 10 BSE mid-cap picks across sectors.

title: HDFC Bank, Bajaj Auto among 11 top conviction stock picks by InCred Equities for June
SEC’s crypto confusion deepens as next-gen ETFs test limits
description: The SEC faces growing regulatory challenges as it reviews new crypto ETFs that earn yield through staking Ether and Solana tokens. The agency’s inconsistent stance on whether these funds qualify as investment companies highlights unresolved questions about how securities laws apply to digital assets. While the crypto industry pushes for lighter regulation, the SEC grapples with defining the boundaries under the decades-old Howey test, leaving the future of next-gen crypto ETFs uncertain.

title: Nazara Tech Aims To Double Core Profit On Back Of Ad Tech
description: Nazara's expansion strategy has proven successful, with past acquisitions like Kiddopia, Sportskeeda and Nodwin Gaming scaling significantly post-acquisition.

title: Reduction In Import Duty On Edible Oils To Help FMCG Companies Improve Margins
description: In the March quarter, FMCG companies hiked rates due to a rise in palm oil prices.

title: India Attracts FDI From 112 Countries, Versus 89 In FY14: Piyush Goyal
description: DPIIT Secretary Bhatia highlighted the significant increase in FDIs during 2024-25 to $81.04 billion, exhibiting a growth of 14% over the 2023-24 fiscal ($71.28 billion).

title: Rate-sensitive sectors like banking, NBFCs, real estate and automobile to gain amid easing rates: Report
description: Sectors like banking, NBFCs, real estate, and automobiles are poised to benefit from India's easing interest rate cycle, as lower borrowing costs boost credit flow, demand, and fixed-income returns amid falling yields and rising liquidity, says Nexedge Research.

title: 8 reasons why India cannot be ignored by FIIs
description: Domestic funds are buffering market volatility while global investors look for fresh growth opportunities, boosting India’s importance in global portfolios once again.

title: Azad Engineering block deal: Nomura picks stake worth Rs 66 crore in this smallcap defence stock
description: Nomura acquired over 4.1 lakh shares in Azad Engineering for Rs 66 crore through a block deal at an 8% discount. Despite the investment, Azad’s stock fell over 5% and remains volatile, underperforming Nifty in 2025.
